Module HW05
Package model

Interface IUpdateStrategy<TMsg>

  • Type Parameters:
    TMsg - The type of message that the supplied IDispatcher can send.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlignedStrategy, AUpdateStrategy, Collide2Strategy, CollideExactStrategy, CollideStrategy, DelayedOverlapStrategy, EatStrategy, FlashStrategy, GravityStrategy, GrowStrategy, KillStrategy, MultiStrategy, OverlapStrategy, ShrinkStrategy, SimilarColorStrategy, SpawnStrategy, StraightStrategy, SwapColorStrategy, SwitcherStrategy, TakeColorStrategy, TeleportingStrategy, ZoneStrategy
    public interface IUpdateStrategy<TMsg>
    The strategy that runs when a Ball updates its state.
    Author:
    Peter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void init​(Ball context)
      Initializes the given ball.
      void updateState​(Ball b, IDispatcher<TMsg> disp)
      Update the properties of a ball.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init​(Ball context)
        Initializes the given ball. Called once by the ball when the strategy is first loaded.
        Parameters:
        context - The ball to initialize.

      • updateState

        void updateState​(Ball b,
                 IDispatcher<TMsg> disp)
        Update the properties of a ball.
        Parameters:
        b - The ball to which the strategy belongs.
        disp - The dispatcher.
